description: Mentioned by Polybius, the Kyathos river is probably to be identified with the modern Dimikos, which is located in the modern Greek Aetolia-Acarnania Regional Unit.
details: The Barrington Atlas Directory notes: Dimikos, formerly Neskhio

history.comment: replacing the abbreviation fl. with (river) to bring titles into conformance with Editorial Guidelines
